Literature.Title: Membrane-Active Cyclic Amphiphilic Peptides: Broad-Spectrum Antibacterial Activity Alone and in Combination with Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Mohammed EHM, Lohan S, Ghaffari T, Gupta S, Tiwari RK, Parang K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=>256µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=>256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27883(MIC=>256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>256µg/ml)
